description: High-end editorial studio portrait of an elegant young East Asian woman standing gracefully against a neutral gradient wall background. She wears a form-fitting long-sleeve red dress with off-shoulder ribbon ties. One hand touches her hair while the other rests near her chest eyes gently closed expression serene and introspective. Smooth wavy hair cascading over shoulders soft radiant skin texture natural yet refined makeup emphasizing pink lips and light blush. The mood is intimate poised and cinematic.

lighting.source: softbox from camera left at 45Â° angle
lighting.fill_light: none or very subtle ambient bounce
lighting.background_light: faint gradient falloff on neutral wall

environment.background: plain neutral wall with subtle light gradient

atmosphere.color_tone: rich red accent with neutral tones
atmosphere.light_behavior: gentle falloff soft gradient shadow on wall
